# updateR : update your R version in a breeze

## scratch

compose url ( get last version using a bit of web scraping)
download package, set folder for download
    curl -o 'R-3.2.2.pkg' 'https://cran.rstudio.com/bin/macosx/R-3.2.2.pkg'
install .pkg file
    installer -pkg 'R-3.2.2.pkg' -target / -verbose
